title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4061.2 - Races started by flag
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4061.2 - Races started by flag

State Regulations

In steeplechases and hurdle races, the horses shall be
started by a flag and there shall be no start until, and no recall after, the
assistant starter has dropped his or her flag in answer to the flag of the
starter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4061.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
